err_t ip_frag (  struct pbuf *  p,
struct netif *  netif,
struct ip_addr *  dest
) 
 

Fragment an IP packet if too large

Chop the packet in mtu sized chunks and send them in order by using a fixed size static memory buffer (PBUF_ROM)
